title: Daylight.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Daylight.Repack-R.G.Mechanics


Year: April 29, 2014.
Genre: Action (Horror)
Developer: Zombie Studios
Publisher: Zombie Studios
Publication Type: RePack
Language: English
Language: English
Crack: enclosing (3DM)

System requirements:

Operating System: Windows 7 SP1 / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1
Processor: 2.3 + GHz
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Video: DX11 with Feature Level 11
Free space on hard disk: 5 GB available space

Description:

Daylight - video games in the genre of Survival horror. The developer and publisher 
of the game Zombie Studios. This is the first game created on the graphics engine 
Unreal Engine 4. 

Feature of the game is that each time generated by different locations, each new 
time the player will play the game in a new location, the protagonist is a woman, 
whose name and biography are still unknown. 

She wakes up in an abandoned mental hospital dilapidated and can not remember how 
it got there. This mental hospital is renowned for its brutal history, that it for 
many years to conduct cruel experiments on human beings. Now the souls of those 
killed roam throughout the hospital. 

The only source of light for the heroine in an abandoned building - a mobile phone, 
which incorporates a flashlight, it helps to pass between rooms with its own light, 
but sometimes ghosts inhabit the phone and he starts to play audio and video files 
on the life of the heroine, and when approaching ghosts starts then turn off, then 
turn on. Can not kill the ghosts, just scare them away or flares or fluorescent 
sticks. For orientation in the building used a compass, which is embedded in a mobile 
phone, an ultraviolet lamp also there in the phone, you can use it to read the messages 
that are written on the walls, fluorescent sticks also help to read the messages on the 
walls. On the walls you can read stories of a mental hospital and find a way out of 
the building.


Features repack

Daylight
Do not cut / recoded
Game Version: 1.0 (update 1)
